title: The Story of Us with Morgan Freeman
text:
The Story of Us with Morgan Freeman is a <a href="documentary">documentary</a> <a href="Television%20program">series</a> televised on the <a href="National%20Geographic%20Channel">National Geographic Channel</a> in 2017. It is hosted and narrated by <a href="actor">actor</a> <a href="Morgan%20Freeman">Morgan Freeman</a>. Produced by <a href="Revelations%20Entertainment">Revelations Entertainment</a>, the series examines some of the fundamental forces that drive <a href="human">human</a>ity including love, freedom, peace, factionalism, power and rebellion. The thesis of the series is that people have more in common with each other than what divides them. Six episodes in total, the show airs in an hour long format for a total of six hours (including commercials).
National Geographic approved the series in April 2017 and the first episode aired on October 11, 2017 at 9 pm EDT (8 pm central time)
